segments.text: I would like to order some internet today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of internet is there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get DEL or dial-up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which of those two is best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's better because it doesn't tie up the phone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean by that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: DEL isn't connected through your phone line , but dial-up is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So then I can't use my phone if I'm on the internet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's correct . With DEL you can do both .
segments.speaker: S2
